channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon: Planar Compass
channel.description:
On the new *Fear of a Black Dragon* Tom and Jason discuss the first two issues of this zine for *Old School Essentials* which features ships sailing on dark inter-planar seas.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/planar-compass
